description.value: Graz'zt's tongue is a slab of spongy, red flesh, that hardens upon the creature's death. The tongue can be used by alchemists to create potions of persuasion and charm. Use: Rumor has it that a bard who holds the tongue (even if dried out, and preserved), gains a persuasive gift of gab. When performing to a crowd, a creature that holds the tongue will get a +2 to their performance check.
